name: Berserker Strike
base_effect: Slam target with massive strike dealing high Physical Damage and additional damage over 5 seconds. While slotted gain Minor Fortitude increasing Health Recovery.

name: Onslaught
base_effect: Each hit increases next hit damage by 33% stacking up to 3 times. Deals high Physical Damage with additional bleed damage over 5 seconds.

name: Berserker Rage
base_effect: Grants immunity to crowd control effects for 5 seconds after activation. Deals high Physical Damage with additional bleed damage.

name: Uppercut
base_effect: Wind up a powerful upward swing dealing high Physical Damage and knocking enemy into the air and stunning them for 3.5 seconds.

name: Dizzying Swing
base_effect: Reduced cast time. Wind up a powerful upward swing dealing high Physical Damage and setting enemy Off Balance for 7 seconds.

name: Wrecking Blow
base_effect: Increased damage. Wind up a powerful upward swing dealing very high Physical Damage and knocking enemy into the air stunning for 3.5 seconds.

name: Critical Charge
base_effect: Charge with great speed to enemy dealing Physical Damage. This attack always critically strikes if cast at 10m or more.

name: Stampede
base_effect: Charge to enemy dealing Physical Damage and creating AoE that deals damage over time. Always critically strikes at 10m or more.

name: Critical Rush
base_effect: Charge to enemy dealing Physical Damage. Damage increased up to 50% based on distance. Always critically strikes at 10m or more.

name: Cleave
base_effect: Swing weapon in wide arc dealing Physical Damage to all enemies in front and additional damage over 10 seconds.

name: Carve
base_effect: Swing weapon dealing Physical Damage to enemies in front and additional bleed damage over 10 seconds. Grants Minor Heroism per enemy hit.

name: Brawler
base_effect: Swing weapon dealing Physical Damage to enemies in front and additional bleed damage. Grants damage shield per enemy hit for 6 seconds.

name: Momentum
base_effect: Build up momentum gaining Major Brutality and Sorcery increasing Weapon and Spell Damage by 20% for 33 seconds.

name: Forward Momentum
base_effect: Gain Major Brutality and Sorcery for 33 seconds. Also removes and grants immunity to snares and immobilizes for 4 seconds.

name: Rally
base_effect: Gain Major Brutality and Sorcery for 20 seconds. Heals over time and heals additional amount when recast based on time elapsed.

name: Reverse Slash
base_effect: Slash enemy dealing Physical Damage. Deals up to 300% more damage to enemies below 50% Health.

name: Reverse Slice
base_effect: Slash enemy dealing Physical Damage. Deals up to 300% more damage to enemies below 50% Health. Splashes to nearby enemies.

name: Executioner
base_effect: Slash enemy dealing Physical Damage. Deals up to 400% more damage to enemies below 50% Health. Restores Stamina on kill.

name: Forceful
base_effect: Increases splash damage of Light Attacks with Two Handed weapons by 60/120%.

name: Heavy Weapons
base_effect: Axes bleed for 6 seconds. Swords increase damage done by 3/6%. Mauls ignore 10/20% Physical Resistance.

name: Balanced Blade
base_effect: Reduces cost of Two Handed abilities by 3/6%.

name: Follow Up
base_effect: Fully-charged Heavy Attacks grant Empower increasing damage of next Light Attack by 40% for 5/7 seconds.

name: Battle Rush
base_effect: Killing enemy grants Major Expedition increasing movement speed by 30% for 8/10 seconds.

name: Shield Wall
unlock_method: Level 12 in One Hand and Shield
base_effect: Bolster defenses becoming immune to all disabling effects and blocking all attacks at no cost for 6 seconds.

name: Spell Wall
base_effect: Immune to disabling effects and block all attacks at no cost. Reflects all projectiles back at attackers.

name: Shield Discipline
base_effect: Immune to disabling effects and block all attacks at no cost. Grants Major Heroism generating Ultimate.

name: Puncture
unlock_method: Level 1 in One Hand and Shield
base_effect: Thrust weapon dealing Physical Damage and applying Major Breach reducing armor for 15 seconds. Taunts enemy for 15 seconds.

name: Ransack
base_effect: Thrust weapon dealing Physical Damage applying Major Breach and granting you Major Resolve increasing armor. Taunts enemy.

name: Pierce Armor
base_effect: Thrust weapon dealing Physical Damage applying Major Breach and Minor Breach reducing armor further. Taunts enemy.

name: Low Slash
unlock_method: Level 4 in One Hand and Shield
base_effect: Slash enemy dealing Physical Damage and applying Minor Maim reducing damage done by 5% for 12 seconds.

name: Deep Slash
base_effect: Slash in cone dealing Physical Damage to enemies and applying Minor Maim reducing damage done by 5%.

name: Heroic Slash
base_effect: Slash enemy dealing Physical Damage and applying Minor Maim. Grants Minor Heroism generating Ultimate over time.

name: Defensive Posture
unlock_method: Level 14 in One Hand and Shield
base_effect: Bolster defenses reflecting next projectile cast at you for 6 seconds. Reflected projectile deals damage.

name: Defensive Stance
base_effect: Reflect next projectile and stun attacker for 3 seconds. Reflected projectile deals increased damage.

name: Absorb Missile
base_effect: Absorb next projectile healing you instead of dealing damage. Converts to Magicka ability.

name: Shield Charge
unlock_method: Level 20 in One Hand and Shield
base_effect: Charge with shield raised dealing Physical Damage and stunning enemy for 2.5 seconds.

name: Shielded Assault
base_effect: Charge dealing Physical Damage and stunning enemy. Grants damage shield for 6 seconds after charging.

name: Invasion
base_effect: Charge dealing Physical Damage stunning enemy for 4 seconds. Reduces cost and extends stun duration.

name: Power Bash
unlock_method: Level 38 in One Hand and Shield
base_effect: Slam shield into enemy dealing Physical Damage. Stuns enemy and briefly knocks them back.

name: Reverberating Bash
base_effect: Slam shield dealing Physical Damage and stunning. Applies Major Defile reducing healing received by 16%.

name: Power Slam
base_effect: Slam shield dealing Physical Damage in frontal cone stunning all enemies hit.

name: Sword and Board
unlock_method: Level 5 in One Hand and Shield
base_effect: One Handed weapons gain 5/10% damage shield bonus.

name: Deadly Bash
unlock_method: Level 10 in One Hand and Shield
base_effect: Increases bash damage by 100/200% and reduces bash cost by 25/50%.

name: Fortress
unlock_method: Level 22 in One Hand and Shield
base_effect: Increases amount blocked by 10/20%.

name: Constitution
unlock_method: Level 30 in One Hand and Shield
base_effect: Blocking restores 660/990 Magicka and Stamina based on Max Resource.

name: Battlefield Mobility
unlock_method: Level 50 in One Hand and Shield
base_effect: Reduces snare and immobilize durations by 21/36%.
